description: Explore the growth and impact of Arbitrum's Total Value Locked (TVL) as a leading layer-2 scaling solution in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. Learn about its scalability, economic implications, and future prospects.
keywords: Arbitrum, TVL, layer-2 solution, decentralized finance, DeFi, Ethereum, scalability, blockchain, optimistic rollups, liquidity
title: Unpacking Arbitrum's TVL: Understanding the Rise and Impacts of a Leading Layer-2 Solution
